dt: {bc}a closed meeting of a group of persons belonging to the same political party or faction usually to select candidates or to decide on policy
{bc}a group of people united to promote an agreed-upon cause

shortdef: a closed meeting of a group of persons belonging to the same political party or faction usually to select candidates or to decide on policy; also : a group of people united to promote an agreed-upon cause

dt.t: The committee {wi}caucused{/wi} to select the most promising candidates.

shortdef: to meet in or hold a caucus
